mapper.select: SELECT arr.`code` roleCode, ar.request_url path FROM u_auth_user_role aur INNER JOIN u_auth_role arr ON aur.role_id = arr.id INNER JOIN u_auth_role_authority aua ON aua.role_id = aur.role_id INNER JOIN u_auth_resource ar ON ar.id = aua.authority_id WHERE ar.request_url IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ar.request_url

select id, account, password, `name`, org_id AS org, station_id AS station, email, mobile, sex, status, avatar, nation, education, position_status, work_describe, password_error_num, last_login_time, update_user, update_time, create_user, create_time from u_auth_user where id = #{id}
SELECT DISTINCT arr.`code` FROM u_auth_user_role aur INNER JOIN u_auth_role arr ON aur.role_id = arr.id WHERE aur.user_id = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT ar.request_url FROM u_auth_user_role aur INNER JOIN u_auth_role_authority aua ON aua.role_id = aur.role_id INNER JOIN u_auth_resource ar ON ar.id = aua.authority_id WHERE aur.user_id = #{id} and ar.request_url IS NOT NULL
